com.owlike.genson

Interface Deserializer<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of objects this deserializer can deserialize.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Converter<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BeanDescriptor, BeanViewConverter, ClassMetadataConverter, DefaultConverters.ArrayConverter, DefaultConverters.ArrayDequeConverter, DefaultConverters.BigDecimalConverter, DefaultConverters.BigIntegerConverter, DefaultConverters.BooleanConverter, DefaultConverters.ByteArrayAsIntArrayConverter, DefaultConverters.ByteArrayConverter, DefaultConverters.CalendarConverter, DefaultConverters.CollectionConverter, DefaultConverters.ComplexMapConverter, DefaultConverters.DateConverter, DefaultConverters.DoubleConverter, DefaultConverters.EnumConverter, DefaultConverters.EnumSetConverter, DefaultConverters.FileConverter, DefaultConverters.FloatConverter, DefaultConverters.HashMapConverter, DefaultConverters.HashTableConverter, DefaultConverters.IntegerConverter, DefaultConverters.LinkedHashMapConverter, DefaultConverters.LinkedHashSetConverter, DefaultConverters.LinkedListConverter, DefaultConverters.LongConverter, DefaultConverters.MapConverter, DefaultConverters.NumberConverter, DefaultConverters.PrimitiveConverterFactory.booleanConverter, DefaultConverters.PrimitiveConverterFactory.doubleConverter, DefaultConverters.PrimitiveConverterFactory.intConverter, DefaultConverters.PrimitiveConverterFactory.longConverter, DefaultConverters.PriorityQueueConverter, DefaultConverters.PropertiesConverter, DefaultConverters.SetConverter, DefaultConverters.ShortConverter, DefaultConverters.StringConverter, DefaultConverters.TimestampConverter, DefaultConverters.TreeMapConverter, DefaultConverters.TreeSetConverter, DefaultConverters.URIConverter, DefaultConverters.URLConverter, DefaultConverters.UUIDConverter, DurationConverter, IntervalConverter, JSR353Bundle.JsonValueConverter, NullConverter, NullConverter.NullConverterWrapper, OptionalConverter, PeriodConverter, ReadableInstantSerDe.ReadableInstantDeser, RuntimeTypeConverter

    public interface Deserializer<T>
    Deserializers handle deserialization by reading data form ObjectReader and constructing java objects of type T. Genson Deserializers work like classic deserializers from other libraries.
    Author:
    eugen
    See Also:
    Converter

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T deserialize(ObjectReader reader, Context ctx) 

    • Method Detail

      • deserialize

        T deserialize(ObjectReader reader,
            Context ctx)
              throws Exception
        Parameters:
        reader - used to read data from.
        ctx - the current context.
        Returns:
        an instance of T or a subclass of T.
        Throws:
        JsonBindingException
        JsonStreamException
        Exception
